summary: A small but complete player home in the Eldergleam sanctuary.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][color=#ffff00][u][size=4]Eldergleam House
[/size][/u][/color][color=#00ffff][color=#ffff00]I made this house for myself but decided to share it with everyone who wanted it.
First thing I should mention is this house requires a key, it is located in a barrel in the side of the house.
Inside it has multiple weapon racks and plaques, and two mannequins,
alchemy workbench, arcane enchanter, and bookcase.

[youtube]FswPHgSUR8I[/youtube]

[color=#00ffff][size=4]You can teleport directly into the house by using the console command[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5]:[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=5]"[color=#ff7700]coc eldergleamhouse[/color]"[/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff]And you can fast travel from the house to anywhere[/color]

It also has plenty of storage space for just about everything you need to store. It is a no reset zone,
so it should be safe to leave anything you want there.
There is a safe located in the bedroom that also requires a key, which is placed on top of the safe.

Outside I've put in a Forge and workbench, also Sond will sweep your porch for you as
I gave him a sandbox package and laid out some idle markers for him. [/color]
[/color][color=#00ffff][color=#ffff00][size=2][color=#00ffff][size=1][b]
[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=5]Uninstall the previous version and make a new save, install new version.
If you don't do this, things will not show up right.[/size][/color][/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=3][b]
Update log[/b][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=1][b]version 1.1:
[/b][color=#ffff00]1. Small area for planting in the cellar, working fine at last check.
2. Fish hatchery, but its not properly spawning at the moment,
but I didn't want to make everyone wait till I figured it out.[/color][color=#ffff00]
3. Updated walkway leading to the house
4. More containers for storage in obvious places.
5. More weapons plaques.
6. Various other small fixes and tweeks.
[/color][/size][/color][/center]
author: UrValdBagina
